data.text: @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson Those two men are trying to save lives and America. Florida Surgeon General is brilliant. So is his boss.

@davidra @AzionePensiero @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson The vaccine almost never stop transmission and if it did on short term waned much faster then protection of infection. There was nothing scientific about vaccine mandate..

@davidra @AzionePensiero @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson The only reason that people feel lack of liberty is their fear and angryness that instead if being angry that the vaccine don’t work as promised against what company told you you put your agryness on others that told you you shouldn’t trust them.. that’s practical but false

@davidra @AzionePensiero @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson People still lost job and people in health care cannot work. In canada non vaccinated cannot even exit the country. When basically there is no difference in transmission that is significative now. So calling about being responsible of lack of liberty of others ? Really

@davidra @AzionePensiero @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson A read article.. clearly i am not the one biaised here.. You don’t have any reference to back up your claim that vaccine will reduce transmission and you accuse me of being biased ? https://t.co/QnA3tUCipW
@davidra @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson about what? Many things I have stated are pulled from either data in studies or government reports. I might as well be talking to a bot

@davidra @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson They are scattered everywhere, some facebook groups that are targeted by censorship, subreddits, VAERS (meaningful events significantly underreported, useless ones overreported), hundreds (over a thousand) scientific publications on adverse events...
@davidra @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson convinced on fucking what? you are talking to a wall because you keep pretending I'm someone that I'm not
@vlher_ @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson Wait, what am I even doing. You've already demonstrated that you can't be convinced. I'm done with you until I see you spreading more lies. Peace.
@vlher_ @realDailyWire @jordanbpeterson Show me the f*cking charts on the "victims of vaccines".
